toggle_long_press_to_reorder_widgets: Whakahohe/ Monohia te perehi roa ki te whakarite ano i nga widget

$ai_chat.intro: Kia ora! Ko au tō koutou AI ā-rohe. Me pēhea taku āwhina i a koe?
$ai_chat.start_typing_prompt: Tīmata te pato i tētahi tohu...
$ai_chat.download_title: Tikiake i te kōnae LLM e hiahiatia ana:
$ai_chat.teaser_description: Whakamahia te mana o te Generative AI i runga i ō taputapu. Kōrerorero, tuhi waehere, hanga rānei i ngā aunoatanga matatau me te haumarutanga o tētahi pūnaha ā-rohe, tūmataiti hoki.
$ai_chat.loading_model: E utaina ana te tauira ki te mahara... Tērā pea ka roa te wā.
